section.title: Uploading the Appliance Manually
section.para: The following procedure provides manual upload instructions if the Image Uploader tool is not available or fails to upload.

procedure.title: To Manually Upload the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance

step.para: Log into a host in your Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization with a mount to the Export storage domain.
Change to the Export storage domain's directory.
Copy the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance OVF archive to this directory.
Extract the OVF file using the tar command:
Set the following permissions: chown -R 36:36 images/ chown -R 36:36 master/
